title: Easy Learning Together
description1: Personal project, build mainly with ReactJs and deployed on one of my personal domain
description2: Aiming to develop an education program for elementar mathematics

title: My Smarter Life
description1: Personal project, build mainly with JavaScript and JQuery
description2: Aiming to develop an education program for elementar mathematics

title: Oxfam GiftAid Logger
description1: This Project was created for bootcamp group challenge - I was responsible of back-end (including Firebase Database); deployed on Netlify
description2: Focused on using React, Node and Firebase, for the creation of dynamic user interfaces in order to streamline the development process by providing reusable components, modular code structure, and efficient server-side rendering using React's virtual DOM that enables better performance, and scalability

title: Team Profile Generator
description1: This Project was created for bootcamp challenge. NodeJS, NPMs, Jest, Constructors and Classes, JavaScript and JQuery
description2: It is a Node.js command-line application that takes the user input about employees on a software engineering team, then generate an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person. There is no diplay link as it is only a console app

title: Password generator tool
description1: This Project was created for bootcamp challenge. Focus on Javascript.
description2: It is generating a password according to user choice's character types and length.

title: Code Quiz Application
description1: This Project was created for bootcamp challenge. Focus on HTML, CSS and JavaScript
description2: It takes an array of objects as questions with one possible correct answer and create a nice webpage that interact with the user, calculate user correct answers to the displayed question and display the high score at the end. The interaction is timed on timer and every wrong answer penalised the user with 10 seconds

title: Daily Planner App
description1: This Project was created for bootcamp challenge. Focus on  HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, and Dayjs
description2: The user is able to add text in every hour slots and by pressing the right 'floppydisk' icon the data is saved in the local storage to stay even if the page is refreshed. The current time slot is marked with red color and the future time-slots are colored green.

title: Weather DashBoard
description1: This Project was created for bootcamp challenge. Focus on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, Dayjs and API
description2: It takes the user input and is using API to fetch weather data from https://openweathermap.org/ . It is displaying the temperature, humidity and wind speed for the current day and the forecast weather for next 5 days. The searched city is displayed bellow the search box and the display history persist if the page is refreshed.

title: Professional README Generator
description1: This Project was created for bootcamp challenge. focus on NodeJS, JavaScript and JQuery
description2: It takes the user input in the terminal using nodejs and 'inquirer' NPM, then it use the answers to create a file and generate the content in the format of a README.md file - console app only (no deployed link)
